analysis.key_quote: I firmly oppose the implementation or revival of the “Schedule F” classification for federal employees. This proposal threatens the integrity of the merit-based civil service system that has supported a professional, nonpartisan federal workforce for over a century.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the implementation of Schedule F, citing concerns about the integrity of the merit-based civil service system and the potential for politicization of federal employment. It emphasizes the importance of due process and nonpartisan governance, aligning with themes that inherently oppose the proposed rule.
